/*!
 * Copyright (c) Microsoft Corporation.
 * All rights reserved. See LICENSE in the project root for license information.
 */import{MSDyn365Commerce,msdyn365Commerce}from'@msdyn365-commerce/core-internal';// tslint:disable:no-invalid-this
export const initializeApp=bindings=>{/**
     * Why we are using 'Prototype'. MSDyn365Commerce is defined in core packages and used in modules and C1 development.
     * whereas all registration, build information, commerce details etc available in runtime-internal package.
     * prototype help us declaring properties in core package and implementation in runtime-internal package.
     *
     * Following properties are not accessible by module or c1 developer.
     */MSDyn365Commerce.prototype.bindings=bindings;MSDyn365Commerce.prototype.moduleBinder=function(name){return this.bindings&&this.bindings.modules&&this.bindings.modules[name&&name.toLowerCase()];};MSDyn365Commerce.prototype.viewBinder=function(name){return this.bindings&&this.bindings.views&&this.bindings.views[name];};MSDyn365Commerce.prototype.componentBinder=function(name){return this.bindings&&this.bindings.components&&this.bindings.components[name];};MSDyn365Commerce.prototype.dataAction=function(name){return this.bindings&&this.bindings.dataActions&&this.bindings.dataActions[name];};// tslint:disable-next-line: no-any
MSDyn365Commerce.prototype.getConnector=function(name){return this.bindings&&this.bindings.connectors&&this.bindings.connectors[name];};MSDyn365Commerce.prototype.getAllModuleBinder=function(){return this.bindings&&this.bindings.modules&&Object.values(this.bindings.modules);};MSDyn365Commerce.prototype.updatePrivateVariable=function(){// @ts-ignore
this._env=process.env.NODE_ENV;};msdyn365Commerce.updatePrivateVariable();};
